website_summaries.verdict: By adding the ability to create its own WiFi field, this unit works over a longer range than the company’s previous units.
pros: Works well from the dock or boat
Smartphone app-enabled finder with a sensor that attaches to lure

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Before you buy this product you need to know that the battery in the product last a little over a year. To replace the battery you must pay for shipping all the way to Lithuania plus the cost of repair. I wish I had considered this before purchasing this overpriced piece of trash. For $200+ you should get more than 1 year use. My Garmin is over a decade old. Yes I do have to replace the battery yearly but it's something I can pick up at Wal-Mart. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: carlos wayne matthews

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using it twice
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after using it twice, i contacted customer service and nothing was done.
customer_reviews.author: Jaw Nab

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Amazing it dies everything my larger much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, Amazing it dies everything my larger much more expensive unit does.s little hard to open but their is a reason, to keep it water proof. This fantastic for ice fishing and it fits in your coat pocket. I've tried it , lake fishing, ocean fishing off a pier, and best of all ice fishing. The only negative is my phone dies 3times faster than the unit.bring a battery booster for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: bob jensen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not working in muddy water (I am from Mekong river, the water is muddy all year round)
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Pham

customer_reviews.title: My son Lives on a lake. He received it ...
customer_reviews.text: My son Lives on a lake. He received it as a gift a month ago. It works with ice fishing and now with scanning the lake floor for depth/profile and fish. He has used it a lot with his phone. It works and he loves it...... such a small device has opened up a new perspective on the lake for him. 5 stars for design and function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Went to download the app and it keeps saying not compatible in the US. Searched for it everywhere and it doesn't exist. Have an iOS 10.3 so it's suppose to be compatible. Not impressed so far. I will update my review if we can ever get an app to try it out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: great product I wish the Wi-Fi issue wasn't so had ...
customer_reviews.text: great product I wish the Wi-Fi issue wasn't so had to get connection and maybe also a on and off button or switch. To answer your question: Yes I have connected the deeper to the correct place on the device. I haven't tried turning off my data on my phone yet but I will. Thanks for that advice. I had a few times issue saying that I had the wrong password while trying to connect to the device even tho that the signal was strong. 12345678. I wish I could change the default password. I had a few times after casting the device turned off :(
customer_reviews.author: Murilo

customer_reviews.title: very promising, but lots of issues with the unit
customer_reviews.text: this unit is a great idea and I loved it during the first time usage. Until it kept reporting that there are NO fish in the area. While I still kept catching and seeing them. Which kinda defeats the purpose of it. During this time, deeper also pulled its app and forced me to downgrade to the older one ( they did apologize profoundly for it). I really hope that these things are ironed out in the future, at which point I would love to re-buy it, since the actual concept is brilliant as are the associated tools and online applications.
customer_reviews.author: berlinguyinca

customer_reviews.title: Fake fish pictures
customer_reviews.text: After being suspicious of the fact that the fish on the monitor were always swimming in the same direction I put Deeper to the test. I cast it out the water was about 6’ deep I had my brother swim under the unit and to my suprime it showed nothing!! It should have shown an Orca! What if you were in the ocean and a large fish swam under? Why didn’t it identify a large object? I believe the fish shown swimming by are fake it’s just a cartoon in a cartoon grave yard.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product because the Deeper did not work, the base is not so stable on the stick. But the best thing is that amazon never reimbursed me the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plan on buying the add on orange top cover!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this. I am upset that it does not come standard with the Orange colored top. There is an LED light under the top cover and is only useful if you buy the additional translucent orange top ($10-$15). This is not just handy for night fishing but the orange is still needed in the day. Very lame of the company, when we pay around $250, to charge extra for what we all really need with the Deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guess work out.  And answers the question, "are there any fish here ?"
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I spent most of the day on the lake and didn't catch a thing. The Deeper Sonar showed an occasional minnow passing by and took the guess work out of why it was a bad day. It wasn't me, there were just no fish. the next day I found fish and things changed. What a time saver! I should have had something like this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anjinsama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this product for about three weeks but as of now it is pretty awesome. The app is user friendly. I’ve had zero issues with connecting to the device. To be honest. I’ve had no issues. At first you will be a bit nervous casting this sucker, but soon you’ll over come that fear. I use 10lb braided line on a decent casting rod to handle the weight. I love the gps mode that maps and saves data.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Just don't actually use it much
customer_reviews.text: IMO. Makes a huge splash when cast. Which won't help in highly pressured area's. And may even spook fish with all the noise casting over and over. I guess it's fine if you want to map an area for future reference. But trying to use it as a bank style fish finder is difficult and may end up being counter productive. Now as a quick and easy finder for kayaks or small boats. I think it would be much better served. But I haven't used it for that as I am not set up for it.
customer_reviews.author: BullNY

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: The unit is really kind of heavy for casting out I use 60 pound braid and I am still scared its going to break the line. The wifi is hit and miss I have a galaxy s9 plus and most of the time it does ok. I have found that the gps mapping from the bank is a little inaccurate a lot of the time. So I guess in all if you use it from a boat you will get better results than from casting out from the bank. The price was a little high but its ok
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fish finder? are you sure?
customer_reviews.text: OK I've had the Deeper Pro for over a year and have used it many times on different lakes. The Deeper is great if you want to know how deep the bottom is, but it hasn't found any fish. I have seen fish swimming under my kayak in clear water and the deeper hasn't shown them, much less triggered the "fish alarm" in either mode. Great idea, to bad it falls short.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martino

customer_reviews.title: misreads. expensive depth finder
customer_reviews.text: was really excited for this however a few things have made my experience unpleasant with it. first say fishing with it seemed really cool at first but then turned into me doubting its readings. it was not picking up the fish i was seeing with my eyes and was picking up fish that were not there. i give it 2 stars because it does function as a depth finder and tempature gage but i was upset with the inaccuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Nash

customer_reviews.title: takes the guesswork out of fishing
customer_reviews.text: This cast-able sonar is amazing. I can literally cast it out see if there are fish and move on if there isn't. The only two downsides for this sonar is 1) the constant disconnection if it's cast too far, and 2) the sonar map shrinking when you press the screen somewhere by accident (seems like a bug). Once the sonar map shrinks the only way to enlarge it again is to exit and restart the app.
customer_reviews.author: ttsai

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but my power node rusted after 1 use (device won't work), returning for a replacement unit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with high hopes. I believe it is a good product, but I received one that was defective. I used it one time in freshwater for about 10 minutes, worked great. Then, when I went to use it a second time it wouldn't connect to my phone. I check the nodes that have to be underwater for it to connect, and one was completely rusted and therefor the device wouldn't connect to my phone. If this didn't happen, Im sure the deeper sonar unit would have worked great. I am returning mine and replacing it with another deeper pro +. Hopefully this one doesn't have the same problem I encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: The Deeper Pro+ worked as advertised. It maintains a connection to my iPhone even when I cast it from the bank. I no longer waste time fishing in locations where there is no fish around. I’m able to find the holes, under water structures, bait fish and the depth of the fish. Read the manual and tips (like turning off the cellular while in use), watch videos online and you should be good to go. The battery last a long time, but probably not as long as they claim. I find I can go about 5-6 fishing trips, depending on how much I use it before having to recharge (your phone battery will die far quicker than the Deeper)
customer_reviews.author: Hobo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best portable fish finders I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various types of portable fish finders for 15 years and the deeper smart sonar Pro is a nice setup. I bought an iPhone 5s to use as a dedicated display. The 5s iPhone is the perfect size for me to attach to the fishing pole. The pole mount, canoe / kayak mount and winter case makes this a very versatile fish finder. I also added the orange cover to allow me to see the location during dusk and night, I like the orange cover and think that it should be included and not a $10.00 plus option but that would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! I've used it in the ocean and in a pond. The depths, temperatures, plant life and most importantly, fish life, are displayed on my phone. There are so many great features - love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Alan

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. As a bank fisherman it's helped out a ton. Buy it because you won't be disappointed. Super helpful for areas you don't know about and using lakebook is awesome for logging everything. I've been to a few spots that were believed to have little structure in them but with this I now have the secret locations!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to setup, battery life is great, and the depth and fish identification is useful as well. I casted it out from shore with ease and then simply tied it to the side of my kayak and it worked great without losing connection. I just left my phone in one of my life vest pockets and it kept connection the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scanner
customer_reviews.text: Loved the features with this. Definitely helps give you a sense of where you need to fish at. Make sure you have at the least 10lb test line and a medium heavy to heavy rod. Anything less and the line will snap and the tip of rod can break l. The Deeper pro has some weight to it so be careful so you don't have to go swimming for your deeper in a river(True Story)..lol
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Technology!
customer_reviews.text: If only this was available when I was younger. Out of the box easy to set up, ran out to the local fishing hole I have fished for 30 years. Amazing to be able to map out the area, and locate the schools of fish so much quicker. Not having any of he issues others have posted, but I also scanned You Tube for how to use the Deeper Pro+ couple of great video on set up and use. If you buy one, spend an afternoon just getting used to all the features. Suggest a Heavy Action Rod for sure, this unit is heavy. My medium action pole was not having it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricy and the mapping is not mature but it works as good as flashers I have used if not better. I have used it ice fishing and performs better than I expected. I have an older smartphone dedicated with Deeper app and Navionics which are a great combo. Now if they could be combined they would be an unbeatable product.
customer_reviews.author: gunner

customer_reviews.title: Helps me find fish!
customer_reviews.text: I never have luck fishing on lakes. Always go home skunked. Went out today and nobody was catching any fish off the dock. I casted out 3 times with the deeper and found some structure where all the fish were hanging out. Set my bobber stop to 7 feet down where deeper said they were and was catching striped bass every cast. Can't argue with success. Glad I invested in this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Munson

customer_reviews.title: This Will help you find fish!
customer_reviews.text: This product work very well. The battery life is very good and it's very easy to use. It adjusts very easy to with the app. I'm an avid angler who likes to find the fish. I noticed that a nice gentle retrieve works best for the results. It definitely works better than my father-in-laws $1100 fish finder that he uses. Cant wait to use in in the winter for Ice Fishing. I will update this review than. If you take care of the product and read the instructions it will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: NEVER caught a fish while using this.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, $240 I should have got the WALL socket charger ALONG with the USB charger. AND I should have got the neon top for NIGHT fishing for free. $240 for something that can't detect ROCK piles off shoreline (in late February) from the fisherman in late summer months using rocks to hold up fishing rods. I get SNAGS because DEEPER says it's a FLAT BOTTOM with ALGAE.. no rocks... WTH
customer_reviews.author: confucius

customer_reviews.title: Deeper Pro+ is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried most of the castable fish finders and Deeper Pro+ is the best in my view and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lacy

customer_reviews.title: somehow not accurate
customer_reviews.text: the finder seems works fine until we start fishing around a bridge. under the bridge there is a flat structure this finder always show as fish in a fixed depth and obviously this finder fails to detect that's a structure instead of bunch of fishes. the reason I know it fails because no matter what time we test, it always show at that specific depth there is a big fish every second of screen refresh. this somehow surprised me because this is a very normal scenario but it failed to handle it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kang

customer_reviews.title: Overall the sonar is amazing but make sure that you tighten the bolt or ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the sonar is amazing but make sure that you tighten the bolt or eles you will lose your sonar. Around Every 50 cast make sure it did not losen or eles you risk losing it. But besides that this sonar is better then another I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Trips a lot more Easy and easy to find fish.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this a few months ago and I always wait before I give a reviews. However it works perfect o find fishes with no problem love the fact that its wifi and very accurate. Defiantly great i'm a mom with 4 kids we love to fish so it helps out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Crystal Hale

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have compared it to expensive units on boats, reads properly. I use it anytime I bank fish just to see whats around. I'm not easy on this thing and it has never failed. I cast it with a surf rod as hard as I can. Works on my kayak as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Serious Flaws With Latest App Version
customer_reviews.text: At the end of Aug 2019, Deeper released a completely revamped iOS and Android apps (v8.x). With the new app, they have introduced serious usability flaws that render the product almost completely useless. Do yourself a favor, and read the latest reviews in the App Store before purchasing this product. I would be more than happy to revise This review when the company reverts the app to its old (7.X) version.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: If you think your line is enough, go up a few sizes, just in case.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to be casting this, string it up with 20+lb braid. I’d even tie on a swivel or file down the provided eyelet. Haven’t had a line break at the eyelet, but did have my 15lb braid snap when shooting for about 30yds and had to grab the line to stop it coming out of the bale. I probably could have been on a shorter rod, but it was what I had with me, it wasn’t a short rod, so it probably came off pretty hot......anyways, luckily there was a workable current so I got my deeper back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R. Snow

customer_reviews.title: It dont work to well with apple
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sonar but it does not work well with my iphone x. The range is very short and if i throw it much farther it will just disconnect from the app and I have to restart it. When i use my friends andriod phone samsung s4 it works perfectly. range is great and no dropping out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little expensive for not coming with its own screen end it doesn’t work great with android
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little expensive for not coming with its own screen end it doesn’t work great with android or Garman
customer_reviews.author: Catmash

customer_reviews.title: Great fish finder for bank fisherman.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I mainly fish from the bank. It's been great healing me find depth and structure and putting me on the fish. I highly reccomend. The only thing I dislike is having to log in to the app every time I use it. It will remember you for a while but if you only use it every couple of weeks it has you re-login.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I love the deeper it’s the best product out there that I found for fishing from shore and ice fishing. My cousin has a vexilar and we used it ice fishing with my deeper. No comparison the deeper was by far the best. It worked so good he sold his vexilar and got the deeper now he uses it on his jon boat works better then his eagle depth and fish finder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice fishing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I used it for the first time today and I used it for ice fishing. The battery lasted about 5 hours and I recharged while I continued to fish. Once charged I finished the evening using it. Would and have suggested to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: ryanrogers

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with all this device can do
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with all this device can do. It is still new to me but as I learn i am more and more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Meatball

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Easy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Worked for me as described. So far I used it few times and no problem at all. Fishing from shore have always been a challenge, but deeper change that for me. Good Job Deeper
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brzozowski

customer_reviews.title: Best castable sonars
customer_reviews.text: Best castable sonars. Compared side to side with ibobber. This sees fish when they are present, the ibobber sees rock as fish. I can see the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Gutshot

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great at finding depth, ok for fish find. Best use small boat on creeks,rivers,reservoirs to find depths, catfish holes, bass embankments, best trolling path on favorite lake
customer_reviews.author: OneBadTexan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy Deepse, I fish a lot and this has helped me map out my favorite spots and how fish move/stay around.. The only thing that YOU NEED TO KNOW is: only because you buy this doesn’t mean you’re gonna catch fish right away. You need to learn how to use/read a sonar and then you’ll be ready! The only thing that sucks is that the kayak mount is way too overpriced !
customer_reviews.author: Oscar G.

customer_reviews.title: Missing components.
customer_reviews.text: Came without all components in box (Amazon Warehouse)... Didn't get to use, but looked promising. Returned item and had to purchase from different vendor. Amazon shouldn't resell items with missing components. Neutral review for product, 1 star for Amazon Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy at all! I ordered this for 1 day shipping because I was going to go ice fishing the next day. It shipped on time but when I recieved it the box was already opened and it has a big crack in the bottom! It also chargers for an hour and the battery life doesn’t even last over an hour! I believe this was a returned sonar!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for such a pricey product
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and looks ok but has a problem of connectivity between the App and device. It does not connect all the time even for a very short distance.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Salah

customer_reviews.title: Simple to pair with their well thought out Iphone App!
customer_reviews.text: There’s two things needed to catch fish: 1) You need to know where they are and 2) get them to bite on your bait. Deeper Pro definitely solves the first item. I fish for crappie off a large boat dock and it works awesomely to find them! I use it in the “detail” mode with the audible chime turn on. I probe around until I find them. And it does! 50% of my dock fishing puzzle solved! I love it!! Decreases my search time leaving more time to haul them in. The only thing it can’t do is put the fish on the hook! Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: The app was easy to operate and mark with
customer_reviews.text: From my first use of the Deeper Sonar Pro ice fishing, I'm impressed that it worked very well. The app was easy to operate and mark with. Battery life was very good too for leaving it on for four hours straight.
customer_reviews.author: mrl1919

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with this purchase. I was looking at a basic, and much cheaper, version but glad I went with this one. The gps mapping feature is incredible and allows you to go back through the history to see everywhere you have been. Throwing it out the first time made me a little nervous, but no issues at all. I have a leader line attached for quick swapping a bait onto the line after reeling it in
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: not good for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Looses connection with my phone alot. Also shows fish where I'm sure there are none. I expected more for the money I spent. I am thinking on returning it really not worth the money spent. I spend more time messing with it than I do fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: One of the best finders/trackers out there
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. So much information from such a little device. Has been helpful in not only finding best fishing spots, but also for tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Fish hate these.
customer_reviews.text: If you fish from the bank; pond, lake, river you need one on these. The app shows fish, depth, temp and structure. I've used it in a canoe and drop fished with great success. Find the deeper holes around the bank. It shows you where the fish are hanging out and their depth. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but I'm happy with it. Easy to use and more importantly gets me on the fish faster and allows me to map out areas I'm fishing..i suggest buying cheap phone and not activating it, this allows you not to worry as much if you bring on boat.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Gronowski

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and use
customer_reviews.text: The deeper is easy to use sonar / Smartphone devise. My first use was at Table Rock Lake after several days of rain. The lake water was murky and the Deeper picked up debris as fish which made me think I had found the best fishing spot on the lake. After playing with the settings the sonar became more believable and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: but it's fun and works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it in both fresh water on my 14' boat and while surf fishing. Very accurate. The waves do distort the wifi signal and make it a little harder to receive a constant scan, but it's fun and works... everything I expected
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: I love using this product
customer_reviews.text: I love using this product. Specially as a guide being able to chuck this thing into the lake and know the depth of where we are fishing is crucial. Love the gps feature
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bank fisherman and want to have a sonar, this is the product. Use mine at new fishing holes to see where drop offs and the depth of ponds, lakes and rivers I fish.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bloomingdale

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves this thing. I have barely seen ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this thing. I have barely seen him since he got it because he's always fishing now.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Does what it purports to do
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Because of the weight, I use a heavy rod 20 lb test line. No connection issues with phone.
customer_reviews.author: Prader

customer_reviews.title: Connection
customer_reviews.text: Tried two of these. A great idea but didn't work well. I constantly had problems staying connected to the product. This was not because of being to far away either. Battery life is short as well. This would be a great product if they fix the battery life or allow you to be able to replace the battery and fix the connectivity issue. I returned both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine. just wish I had more time to go fishing
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It is easier to handle than the previous products and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for lure fishing. It is easier to handle than the previous products and I like it very much. Thanks to this product you can easily find fish herds. Sometimes you may mistake an anchor rope as a fish flock.
customer_reviews.author: HI M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to my fishing and my work. Very reliable, works great and I use it all the time. The charge lasts a long time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for canoes and kayaks
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to do. It definitely finds the fish. I use it for crappie fishing and all my trips have been successful. I would definitely recommend to all crappie fishermen
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great option for me because I don't have a boat. So far so good. Easily paired with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Brandmeir

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing unit -- works very well
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing unit -- works very well. My husband and son use this device to help them find fish, including ice fishing. It works as it says it does. No complaints here--we love it!
customer_reviews.author: cb4iast8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for off the dock or behind the Kayak.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for tying on to your Kayak or just casting off the dock. I find the fish and my girl goes after them. If she starts catching them, then I fish.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Go Deeper-that’s what she said....
customer_reviews.text: Great product, still working out movement of fish compared to screen but a great tool to have in any situation ... I would recommend to anyone that has limited space. It wants a fish finder to take with them anywhere ..
customer_reviews.author: Kris H

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND YOUR TIME
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no good I thought it would be better because of the price I watched the videos on it before buying and they make it sound like it does so much more then the cheaper ones but it doesnt your better off getting a cheaper one it's no different then this one..SAVE YOUR MONEY ...BELIEVE ME ITS A WASTE OF YOUR MONEY AND YOUR TIME ...
customer_reviews.author: cherie kean

customer_reviews.title: defective item not able to return
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for myself in Sept. for Christmas, I had the flu for 3 wks so I tried it in mid January. Product defective but return period EXP in October. not able to return NOT FAIR JUST NOT FAIR
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Perez

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and universal item!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and I especially love it for ice fishing. Only gripe with this unit is the battery in cold weather. Last 4.5 hours, wish they had an interchangeable battery unit for it. I still give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: This device can be used by bractically anybody!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this device. The only issue that I had is the waterproof seal leaks. I brought the deeper out ice fishing yesterday and periodically checked the seal and found traces of water around the inside of the removable top where the threading is and droplets around the inside of the device. Not sure if there is any sort of warranty but that was my only con. Fast response time between deeper and tablet. Hoping my device doesn't short out..
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Patraw

customer_reviews.title: Easy, useful and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Accurate instructions on paper and online. Used from shore and dock, it appeared to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeA

customer_reviews.title: THE model to buy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the model to get. Love the built-in GPS. Hope I never lose it in a cast.
customer_reviews.author: kent m

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure about this sonar does not work well with my phone loses signal constantly
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kurek

customer_reviews.title: Icefishing mode
customer_reviews.text: I just used mine for ice fishing so far and it works great, I was impressed that the 24" of ice did not interfere with it, also I paired it with my Samsung notepad and it worked good it's nice having that bigger screen. If I had one complaint, on icefishing mode with the flasher portion of the screen when the fish and lure come together i wish it would change color
customer_reviews.author: Bpc07

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this form shore to map lakes and ponds in my area. Works like a charm. Takes a medium-heavy to heavy action rod to cast easily. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Packard

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Bank Fishing Fish Finder!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product easy to use. Just becareful when casting though depending on what type of rod you use, you don't want to launch it possibility of breaking your rod tip, you just want to lob it. Heavy stick and braid I use 65# should do fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Caneppa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked good at first, but 4th time using it, it died. Watch the return window. I missed it by two days.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product when using it but most of the ponds and lakes I’ve been going to in and out of the boat it’s been very useful even for times just leaving it out there to let me know if there’s fish about
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: A new toy for a new fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I've been making the local lakes and ponds, but have yet to really score a great fish with it. However I'm not a seasoned fisherman. I will update this post as I get more time on the water. So more to come. . .
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: So far it has opened our eyes to a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has opened our eyes to a couple of our spots where we fish regularly .. Looking forward to using it this spring ...
customer_reviews.author: jeff h.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for ponds and lakes. You can see if the pond is alive with fish before taking the kids to fish. Can't wait to get the attachment to use on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Stargatesj

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this thing more than his brain I swear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: That directions were very accurate and it worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: When I cast this out for the first time, what I saw on my iPhone screen from the app blew me away. It totally surpassed my expectations and will allow me to be much smarter before I start fishing from shore anywhere or from a dock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The deeper is such superior and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the ibobber, and quickly returned it. The deeper is such superior and easy to use. An awesome product!!! I will recommend the deeper to all the fishermen I know.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fuhrman

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this piece of equipment especially when days are ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must, have tool in your arsenal. I enjoy using this piece of equipment especially when days are tough locating fish. Takes a little getting use too but the technology helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you're not sure where to fish. It works as advertised. The best part is that it's portable so you can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: mega408

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son and he likes it a lot. Says its what he expected.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. As soon as I received it, I charged it quick and headed out to ice fish. Easily connected to its Wi-Fi that's built in, and instantly started marking fish on the app..
customer_reviews.author: charles smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the Deeper
customer_reviews.text: The deeper works great. I cannot wait to get it out on the kayaks for spring fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So much performance for so little price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Deeper Pro+ on my 16' boat all summer. Has worked remarkably well and I highly recommend this product for those looking for a low cost depth finder option. Best part is i didnt have to do any transducer install for the boat. I can't wait to test it for ice fiahing!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kasper

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cool product! It really helped the guys on their fishing adventures and made me look like a pro !
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best fishing tool I have. Works great for ice fishing too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Deeper Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I expected and more. Great product and used it Ice fishing so far and it worked great. I have a small fear of my phone sinking to the bottom of the lake but other than that it worked above expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives a good tactical advantage for fishing for shore
customer_reviews.text: Works well for ice fishing. Gives a good tactical advantage for fishing for shore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Deeper PRO+ Smart Sonar - GPS Portable Wireless Wi-Fi Fish Finder for Shore and Ice Fishing, Black, 2.55" (DP1H10S10)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Deeper Pro+The Deeper Pro+ Smart sonar is a versatile, wireless, cartable fish finder with built-in GPS. Its unique versatility makes it suitable for trolling from a kayak or boat, casting from the shore or using as an ice flasher for winter fishing. Displayed on your smartphone, you?ll be able to see fish location, size and suspended depth. You?ll know water temperature and depth as well as underwater structure, vegetation, bottom contour and hardness All so you can level up your game and fish strategically. Smaller than a baseball and lighter than a big chocolate bar, The Pro+ weighs only 3. 5oz and fits in the palm of your hand. It casts further and scans Deeper than any other cartable fish finder on the market. It has dual beam scanning for shallow and deep waters. It generates its own Wi-Fi signal to connect to your Smartphone. Built-in GPS allows you to create bathymetric maps from the shore and enjoy free access to Lake book, Deeper?s bathymetric management platform where you can save, retrieve, analyze and even share all of your scans and maps. Now that you?ll know the waters, spend more time catching and less time searching, sweating and swearing. Power Adapter - Input AC 110V/240V. Output Micro USB, 5V 450mA
feature_bullets: HIGHEST SPEC CASTABLE SONAR: casts further, scans deeper, more features than any other. Syncs with iOS/Android devices. Use for shore, boat, ice fishing

INBUILT GPS: enables you to create bathymetric maps from the shore, Enjoy free access to Lake book, Deeper' s bathymetric management platform where you can save, review and analyze all of your maps on any device from the comfort of home
ROCK SOLID CONNECTIVITY: Syncs to phone/tablet using WiFi (like a hotspot). NO INTERNET IS NEEDED. Turn OFF Cellular data for uninterrupted connection
INCREDIBLE DATA: Scans down 260ft, 0.5" target separation, dual beam (broad/narrow), 15 scans per sec. Map depth, find structure, vegetation and fish
BOAT FISHING: Install in secs, no cables or batteries, smooth trolling. ICE FISHING: 3.5oz, no cables, flasher display + zoom, 0.5" target separation

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
